name: Christmas trip
description:
WHAT THE GAME IS ABOUT:This is a Christmas themed puzzle game and you have to try not to die and go to the end so will you do it?
HOW TO PLAY: If you touch  the red spikes you will die and if it is green then you can walk on them and to get "keys" you have to get presents another thing is to see how many keys you have you have to hold "x"!
